title: Project Rek'Sai
body: Hey guys! Ik Riot just teased 3 new projection champions which are thought to be Katarina, Ekko, and Ashe. But I've always been thinking about this, what about Project Rek'Sai? Wouldn't it be cool to see a mechanical like beast, a mechanical shark while he's in burrow? Project Rek'Sai!!! Where you at

replies.body:
Does Eternum Rek'Sai not count? Eternum isn't quite the same thing as Project, but the two themes are similar enough that I doubt any champion will get a skin for both.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
where is the teaser you are talking about?

If you haven't found it yet, [here's a link to the News page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/). It's the most recent one.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
